connect20/product_slider_allcategory.name: connect20/Product_slider_allcategory

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/product_slider_allcategory.description:
All categories product slider with it we can select the product of perticuar categories and display it anywhere in site.
we can create multiple slider with it
